segments.text: I see the entire kitchen laid out, angled just right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's facing away, drying her plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on full blast, sink filling to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets over the edge, onto the doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widening at her feet, shiny on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinet doors swung open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar inside, boy's hand diving in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's on the stool, stretched tall and balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It tilts back a littleâ€”oh no!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's below, arm up in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden through the window looks lovely, peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, letting in the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Quite the scene of everyday life with a twist.
segments.speaker: PAR
